text.config.origins-randomiser.title: Origins Randomizer Config
text.config.origins-randomiser.option.ra: Master toggle for origin randomization (except for first spawn)
Toggle global messages about a player's new origin
text.config.origins-randomiser.option.li: Toggle whether the use of /randomise is limited to a set number of times
text.config.origins-randomiser.option.ra: Set the number of times /randomise can be used
text.config.origins-randomiser.option.en: Toggle if players have a set number of lives before they are put in spectator mode
text.config.origins-randomiser.option.st: Set the number of lives players start with
text.config.origins-randomiser.option.li: Set the number lives between origin randomisation.
